note: Wear armor enchanted with Growth 5 (Enchanting Level 5).
Applying Growth 5 costs 50 Levels each.
Mine Cobblestone on the Dwarven Bridge or any spot with cobblestone.
If you want to, you can also build a Cobblestone Generator on your island.
Do 3 Tier 1 Revenant Horror Bosses
and claim the rewards by talking to Maddox.
The easiest pet to go for is the Bingo Pet.
Make sure you have your chosen pet active and remember
to put a skill xp boost pet item on it. You can buy those
from Zog in the Hub (33 70 -96).
Daily Experimentation Table, Mining Commissions and Milestones
aswell as Garden (Crop) Milestones are strong xp sources.
Buy a Dirt Bottle (100k) from the Smithmonger in the Hub (-32 69 -135)
and reforge a weapon with it. Make sure to NOT shift-click it out
of the menu after applying!
Costs 256 Enchanted Oak Wood to craft and
unlocks at Oak Wood Collection 9 (30k).
Optimal for this would be using a Golden Axe with Efficiency 5
and having the Haste 3 potion effect.
Place as many Rabbit Minions as you can (requires 50 Raw Rabbit Collection).
You can get your first few Raw Rabbit by killing Rabbits in the Mushroom Desert,
accessable through the Barn. You can speed up the Collection by killing rabbits with
a Rabbit Axe (purchasable from Jake if someone brought a Rabbit up to him).
Don't forget to give your minions some fuel and medium storages.
Use 3 Glacite Jewels (dropped from Ice Walkers at 0 128 150 in the Dwarven Mines)
to forge a Bejeweled Handle (requires Heart of the Mountain Tier 2).
Kill farm animals in the Barn with a Cleaver with Cleave 5 and Sharpness 5
or spiders in Arachne's Burrow (-309 92 -209) in the Spider's Den with a Dreadlord Sword.
You can find Relic Coordinates in Skytils or the Wiki.
You will need Ender Pearls to reach some of them.
Grind for Garden 8 to unlock Cocoa Beans on your Garden.
Then farm them using the replenish axe from Skymart (25 Copper).
You might have to collect some Cocoa Beans outside of the Garden
after hitting the required amount to complete the Goal.
Talk to Fetchur (84 224 -118) in the Dwarven Mines
and give him the item he describes. Use the Wiki for help
regarding what to give to him.
You will most likely get this passively.
Use /be ingame to view your progress.
Doing this will bring you decently close
to your 10th Minion Slot.
Try to craft every cheap minion you can
get your hands on while doing other things.
Mine emeralds in the Dwarven Mines minecarts above the Bank.
It requires 32 Enchanted Emeralds and Emerald Collection 5 to craft this.
You will most likely get this by banking the money you get from
skill level ups, the Relics and killing mobs.
Kill goblins or open loot chests in the Crystal Hollows,
then just throw them until you get a Golden Goblin.
Higher level eggs have higher chances of spawning, but are also rarer.
Buy all 6 from the Adventurer in the Hub (-41 70 -64):
Zombie/Skeleton Talisman: 500 coins each
Village/Mine Affinity Talisman: 2.5k coins each
Intimidation/Scavenger Talisman: 10k coins each
For the last one you can chose one from the following:
Farming Talisman (Wheat 4), Vaccine Talisman (Potato 3)
Talisman of Coins (Emerald 2), Magnetic Talisman (Emerald 3)
Wood Affinity Talisman (Oak Wood 8), Gravity Talisman (Obsidian 3)
Speed Talisman (Sugar Cane 2), Archaeologists Compass, Shiny Yellow Rock,
Campfire Initiate Badge, King Talisman, Frozen Chicken,
New Year Cake Bag (250k), Glacial Talisman (Frozen Treasure).
Don't forget to take the 4 Bonus accessory bag slots from
the Redstone Miner (24 104 16), he asks for 1920 Redstone in total.
Wear a full set of Ender equipment. One part drops from Endermen (0.5% chance),
one from Ender Nodes (3.05% - 3.32% chance), one from Obsidian Defenders (1% chance) and
one from Watchers (1% chance). You can find these Mobs in the Dragon's Nest (-600 22 -275) in the End.
Try to get to Enchanting Level 10, craft an Experimentation Table (8 Oak Wood and 1 XP Bottle)
and do your daily experiments with it.
